title: Bans without explanation, vague messages
text: I‚Äôve been using Airbnb for the past 8 years and although I‚Äôve had some questionable airbnbs here and there, I generally liked it. However recently, I‚Äôve had the most difficult time with Airbnb due to sudden reservation cancelations from Airbnb, and then getting banned for the vague reason of ‚Äúsomeone associated with my account cannot use Airbnb‚Äù. After contacting them multiple times, I still get no clear answer as to why the ban occurred and they have yet to compensate me for the reservation they cancelled 3 days before the reservation date! I would expect customer service to get better over the years, not worse! Better take your business elsewhere since you‚Äôll never know when you‚Äôll get banned out of nowhere. It happens to hosts as well.

title: Ruined my daughter‚Äôs prom
text: This site is ran by computers not people. I have perfect history and several rental‚Äôs over several years all excellent reviews. Recently when trying to make a reservation I was flagged as party risk . They deleted my account causing me to lose the reservation I had just made and a reservation I had for months for my daughters prom . I emailed them and they immediately reinstated account but property for prom was gone . Next I rebooked the house the caused the original issue . They then closed my account again and now say they will not reinstate. Please boycott this site my daughter is devestated along with all her friends

title: Scam Listings Everywhere
text:
This platform has gone down the drain.  We used to love using it but the last four listings we have tried to book have turned out to be scam listings that did not actually exist!

We have move on to VRBO and will never be back!

title: Sketchy refund policy
text: I had booked my bachelorette trip in Nashville several months in advanced to when I was going. When we did we book it we payed an extra to make sure we would be able to cancel if needed because this was going to be a lot of money. Fast forward to our plans changing in a big way and now we won‚Äôt be able to make this trip happen. It‚Äôs still three months before the trip was scheduled and we have paid half(2780$) and we were told we weren‚Äôt eligible for the refund. Super frustrating because we were even led to believe that we would be able to get that refund and it was 3 months ahead of time.

title: Getting worse
text: What they‚Äôre doing to the hosting side is despicable. It is getting harder to host with the new interface, please fix.

title: Airbnb is a scam
text: The host didn't tell me that I needed to sign a short term lease agreement so I declined to sign it and according to the policy if I host does not tell you that you have to sign a short term lease agreement before booking, the host has to refound all money without penalties so these scam company didn't make the host to return my money. I lost a total of $2000 beware and protect your money book at the hotel.

title: Terrible customer service
text: I was clearly in an illegal airbnb, and customer support sided with the host. Once I confronted the host, I received a full refund once I threatened to report it to a government agency. Customer support was NO help. Going back to hotels. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME

title: Worst Customer Support Ever
text: I was lied to repeatedly. When I was having issues with support I had over 15 cases over the same thing and no one called me back they always promised they cared and I would get a call back but I NEVER DID I pray anyone who uses this app consistently because eventually the will make up something on your account and stop u from booking with no help or resolution.

title: The app is getting worse by the day
text: The IT people that are starting to revise the app are beginners. They have no idea what the host goes through and they have made it so difficult and the Airbnb app used to be such a breeze and now it‚Äôs become such a drag so I don‚Äôt know who hired this new IT person who is ruining the Airbnb app I have given feedback I have given them recommendations, but they keep ruining the app every day more and more they have taken the price per night out of the listing and have put it in the calendar. It‚Äôs very difficult to find out what the listed prices how much we‚Äôre gonna get paid and all that information I hope the CEO of the company is going to read my review and is going to make changes, please do if you read it

title: Disappointed
text: I booked a place informed the host my flight was delayed. Then my flight got cancelled informed the host the next day. They wouldn‚Äôt cancel the trip charged me full price wouldn‚Äôt even give me half of the 5 day stay. Customer service said they can‚Äôt do anything because the host doesn‚Äôt want to give a refund. So hopefully you never have a flight cancellation because you‚Äôll still have to pay full price for the whole stay. Horrible terms and customer service.

title: Ways to improve
text:
I use Airbnb from 2014. I and my spouse together had more than 50 stays. I appreciate for the service provided. But I really miss few features:

Family account. I don‚Äôt understand why you didn‚Äôt make it so far. My wife is often looking for places where we‚Äôll be staying. Then send it to me over WhatsApp. After some time I look over them or maybe I forget about it and when I come to it again, some of them could be unavailable already. And we have 2 profiles, so our reviews are there and there. It‚Äôll be more convenient to have family profile with shared payment methods and reviews.
Almost all our bookings made for our family. And every time I have to type guests coming with me, it‚Äôs frustrating and easy to fix. 
Refund policies aren‚Äôt guests friendly. I understand you solved issues for the hosts to bring them to your platform, but I believe you‚Äôre big enough to turn ur face to guests now. In case I have to cancel my booking (in case of emergency and not because I changed my mind), I‚Äôll get most likely partial refund and host will get full or partial amount for the cancelled nights. At the same time the host could get new reservation for these dates and get more money without actually losses. In this case host will get 1.5-2x for rebooked nights. It‚Äôll be much more friendly for me as guest if you‚Äôll refund rebooked nights in full (and you can do this easily, you hold money, so you can manage it). It‚Äôs easy, friendly and good for hosts too. And you can promote listings with cancelled nights in your search. And may be guests would love to pay some money (to you) to get it promoted so most likely rebooked. Is it nice? I think so. 

Hope you got my points.

title: Random Account Restrictions
text: I went to use Airbnb for the first time ever, and was restricted because they thought I was having an ‚Äúunauthorized party‚Äù. I contacted the host of the home prior to booking, asked her permission to have my sons get together for his first birthday there & gave her all the details she asked for- she approved it! She even said she‚Äôs accept my invitation to come. Tried to book, and although she confirmed my stay, Airbnb restricted it. I had friends & family try to book the home from their accounts & they were also restricted. I got an automated email every time I reached customer service that said they were upholding their decision. Completely disappointing & inconvenienced as an almost first time user of Airbnb. I will never recommend this to anyone.

title: Terrible
text:
They let you book then let the host cancel on you close to your date.  then everything has sky rocketed in price and there‚Äôs quote nothing that can do. So what‚Äôs the point of booking early to get a good deal if they allow this? 
Went from 200 a night to 700 üôÑ
Will never use this sight again.

title: Terrible terrible experience
text: I was going to put an air Bnb on my credit card, and I did but I selected the wrong dates. I cancelled that RSVP and decided to put that money in the app so there was no lag time to access that money, since I thought I was going to book another one very soon. Well, plans changed and now AirBnB won‚Äôt give me that money back! $380 dollars! I need that money. AirBnb customer service provided no help, and I am left very upset and out $380 dollars. I will not be using AirBnB ever again. They stole my money because they won‚Äôt take it out of the their account and put it back on my card. Thieves. This has gone on since Nov ‚Äò23 and it‚Äôs March ‚Äò24. Airbnb is a billion dollar company and they can‚Äôt help someone in financial need for their money back? Jeepers Creepers

title: Racial profiling
text: There were very judgmental when I uploaded my I.D for them to scan it, Once they seen I was African American they‚Äôve declined my approval. I am very disappointed. 0/10 customers service.

title: User Friendly
text: The best site to try to find a last-minute hotel accommodation

title: Worst customer support
text: The hosts can accuse you of stealing random things that weren‚Äôt even in the apartment you rented, and Airbnb will automatically charge you for those items. Customer support gave me conflicting information about how to deal with the issue, and in the end the host admitted to me that he wasn‚Äôt sure if I took his items but still I got charged $200 for them and never refunded. I opened about 10 support cases and each one gave me bad information and closed the case without my approval. I‚Äôll never use Airbnb again.

title: Bad Customer Service and Crooked Hosts
text: I think my reviews keep being deleted. So here i am again. Made a review on a place in Peoplestown, Georgia. Host neglected a couple details including a bullet hole in a bathroom window that he removed after i made my review on airbnb so now airbnb thinks i was lying. Anyways, spent almost 500 on 4 nights, didn‚Äôt feel safe and it was so loud from the highway plus neighbors above and there was a mildew smell, or it was fresh paint smell so didn‚Äôt stay more than 20mins on the property. Asked for a refund and only received 70. AND review was removed. I did agree to do a solid for the host by keeping the review as a good one but he was greedy so i gave full honesty. Apparently airbnb does not stand by that but more by the crooked hosts.

title: PLEASE ADD CASH APP
text: please add cash app for an option for payment!!!! so for people that don‚Äôt have PayPal have access! please add cash app and also there would be more options  for payment, thank you!

title: This company is trash
text: First I would like to start with I never can send it to a background check on this app so I‚Äôll start with that then let me state that I paid $586 for a room for almost 2 weeks in Oregon. I scheduled this earlier today around one or 2 o‚Äôclock, I just now got the notification that they‚Äôre not going to accept my stay because almost 20 years ago I had gotten in trouble but it‚Äôs been 20 years now. Almost not only that but now I‚Äôve gotta wait 10 days to get my $586 back from this company because they decided to cancel my reservations six hours after I already paid it and now I‚Äôve gotta wait 10 days just to get my $586 back that‚Äôs absolutely ridiculous what I wanna know is how this company is going to take $586 from me tell me that my reservation is good to go and then six hours later tell me that my reservation was canceled because of an offense that I did when I was in my late 20s and now I‚Äôm 40 years oldand have not been in trouble since that day and then tell me that it‚Äôs gonna take 10 days for me to get my money back

title: Awesome
text: Easy, practical and straightforward.

title: Terrible App
text:
The company itself is honestly not caring about its customers. The customer service is awful and do nothing to help people who have been seriously mislead by Airbnb hosts. I‚Äôve used Airbnb a few times and only have a couple of good experiences. For the peace of mind, save yourself the trouble and use a hotel.

Fix your customer service. Update your app.

title: Terrible Customer Service
text: Absolutely terrible business. We booked a condo through Airbnb. We get a notice the booking has been cancelled. I called and they said Alabama Getaway had the wrong pricing and they do not wish to honor it. They said there was a software update and they didn‚Äôt inform them so pricing wasn‚Äôt accurate. Instead of honoring it, they cancelled our reservation. Airbnb said it was not them, it was Alabama Getaway and theres nothing they can do about Alabama cancelling, it was out of their hands. Then that was it. No, let‚Äôs look for another condo, here‚Äôs a credit, promo code absolutely nothing. I called Alabama and said so because you guys had miscommunication with Airbnb and messed up we get screwed by it, they said and I quote ‚Äúyes you do‚Äù. I would never book with someone who doesn‚Äôt care about their customers. Basically saying we'll book this condo for more money and we don't need you.

title: Biggest joke
text: Airbnb is the biggest joke for booking, just because someone is associated with someone doesn‚Äôt mean they are going to be there. Funny thing is yall no problem booking me in the past and no issues but now it‚Äôs different. Screw yall AIRBNB!!!

title: 2639 Observatory
text: Really nice/ clean, quiet place to visit.. I‚Äôll always have this place in mind, when considering a place to stay. You should too. Great job. 2639 observatory unit 2.

title: App is great, Air BnB not so much
text:
The actual app works well and easy to navigate. However, buyer beware. Air BnB takes the position it is only there to connect property owners and renters. You are not their customer and they don‚Äôt care about you. I had a safety issue at a property and Air BnB opened and closed the case while I explained the issue (security door didn‚Äôt open when electricity cut out). They said they would email the owner. But the case is closed, so zero follow-up on a fire/life-safety issue. 

In a separate incident Air BnB did not want to refund its fee when a landlord wasn‚Äôt responsive and I rebooked a different, more expensive place through Air BnB. They finally capitulated, but only after 30 minutes of arguing with their staff. 

Air BnB is often cheaper than a hotel and many people have a great experience. But that has nothing to do with Air BnB. Just know that when you book through them you‚Äôre really on your own and I hope you‚Äôre lucky enough to work with a good property owner.

title: Victoria Drive
text: Just left 3 weeks at this amazing house! Andy the host was the best. So responsive and helpful. Just booked for 2025. Thank you for making our get away so pleasant. House is in a quiet secluded area, no neighbors behind is a huge plus.

title: Auto LLM chats is annoying
text: I understand that the default chat would involve AI and is very automated. But despite providing details and asking for an agent, the systems keeping looping with automated chats and gets a long time to get to a human. Super annoying.

title: Up until now I loved Airbnb
text:
I have been a host and a guest using Airbnb for years before they even started advertising publicly, before dynamic pricing and cleaning fees. I loved it. 
But as of recent it has been brought to my attention that Airbnb rents places in Isreali occupied settlements of stolen Palestinian property. Until this is no longer true, I cannot support anything that is not taking a stand against ethnic cleansing. This does not fit with the image that Airbnb was founded on nor with their goodwill to help those displaced from disasters.

title: Houses are not hotels
text: I get it, people want some extra cash when they have an empty or have a spare room. But what developers are doing, flipping houses that used to be for long time tenants for short term rentals is screwing up everything. I‚Äôm all for options when booking a place to stay and love the idea of getting to know new houses because I like architecture, history behind it and the neighborhood, but that doesn‚Äôt mean that I should pay a $500 rent increase because my area has 10 new airbnbs

title: You are not the customer
text:
Recently I‚Äôve had some issues with bookings on Airbnb.  And it‚Äôs just been a stark reminder that the guests are not airbnbs customers.  The hosts are.

I had an issue with booking a trip for some employees of mine.  I was the name on the reservation, and had tried to get it corrected to be under my employees name, because the host made it clear they would not allow my employee to stay there if they weren‚Äôt the name on the reservation.   The host was also less than willing to communicate with me while I tried to trouble shoot. I tried as many ways as possible to resolve the issue in the ways the host would ask, but for the most part the host would just insist I talk to Airbnb support when I would ask them clarifying questions about how to fix the reservation.

In talking to support, they kept ensuring me that it‚Äôs up to the host how things are handled.  I let them know the host wasn‚Äôt really working with me on the issue.  To which they pretty much responded ‚Äúwell, this is all at their discretion, so you need to work things out with them.‚Äù

This was an expensive booking, too.  And all I wanted was to ensure that my employees could use the booking.  The only option I was being given by the host was to cancel and rebook.  However, there was a no cancellation policy.  And I really didn‚Äôt want to have to pay twice, just to resolve a technicality.  After hours of the host dancing around it, I finally got the host to say they would refund me if I cancelled and rebooked it differently.  But ONLY if and after my second payment went through.  So only after I paid for it twice.  When I (very respectfully) pointed out to the host that this puts me in a position of having to TRUST that they are going to refund me nearly $1000, they simply responded with ‚ÄúLOL‚Äù.

Keep in mind, I had been told by support that we didn‚Äôt have to do it this way.  That the host could call and they could just switch the reservation to the right names. So me having to trust this host with all of my money is something that could have and should have been avoided.  Either way, I decided to call Airbnb support again before doing it the way the host had asked.  I asked them, ‚Äúif I have in writing from the host that they will refund me if I cancel and rebook, and they have told me this over the chat on your platform, are you able to help me in anyway to hold the host accountable and ensure I receive he refund?‚Äù  His answer ‚ÄúNo.  I can call the host and ask them if they want to do it, but it‚Äôs their choice entirely.‚Äù  I asked if they would be willing to call the host to help work this out since the host was not responding to me, and kept insisting that I reach out to support.  Support said they would, and that they would CALL me back.  I asked them to clarify that they would call back, not email or message me on Airbnb.  Support agreed to call me back.

Several minutes later, I got an automated message from Airbnb simply saying that they had resolved my ticket, and that they suggested I cancel and rebook, and that I work with the host to do that.  They did not mention if I would recieve a refund for doing so.  There was, however, a signature at the bottom of the email that said ‚ÄúWe will promptly pay attention and address you if you respond to this message.  I responded to the message.  I recieved an automated reply stating that the representative was out of the office, and that they would address my concern within two days.   The reservation was for the following day.

Anyways.  I cancelled and rebooked.  The host has still yet to refund me for the original booking.  And Airbnb doesn‚Äôt care, because the host is their customer.  Not me.

Will be using Expedia and booking at hotels from now on.

title: Wish I could rate 0 stars
text: Airbnb is the worst, we got reported for damages that we did not cause, we had photographic evidence, they sided with the host. We will never use their service again, and you shouldn‚Äôt either, but if you do I recommend taking thorough videos and photos of every inch of the house you rent right at the time you check in so you don‚Äôt get scammed, but even that may not help your case.

title: Change your ways.
text: I don‚Äôt understand why everyone is writing such great reviews. They claim that they‚Äôre pet friendly. I have never found one that you can leave your animals in their kennel in the house or out of it. They also claim that it is less expensive than a hotel. The last time I traveled I stayed in a hotels, I spent less than 100 dollars a night, and I was able to leave my animals in the room. I just looked up places they offer right now 109 dollars a night‚Ä¶ but there‚Äôs no hot water üò± okay.

title: Logging in is very difficult
text: Every time I go to get on my app it has logged me out and I go to log back in but I can‚Äôt use my phone number because it never actually sends me the verification code. Then this time I accidentally selected my business email instead of my account email and now I can‚Äôt log in to my actual account because every time I click log in with email it takes me to a page where it is trying to make me create a new account with my business email and I can‚Äôt delete it to type in the email I actually use.

title: Don‚Äôt Trust AirBnb
text: DONT TRUST AIRBNB. We just had a host send us a link outside of AirBnb to sign a contract to pay the host the full amount of ‚Äúrent‚Äù up front directly to them. We refused since this is clearly against guidelines. The host refuses to refund us even though we sent the request within one hour of booking, due to their lack of abiding by the rules. Airbnb won‚Äôt help us even though the host is trying to go around them to make money. We‚Äôve used AirBnb countless times & now they won‚Äôt help us even when the host is clearly in the wrong and we have screenshots as proof. Now we are out $3400‚Ä¶ Make it make sense. USERS BEWARE!!!

title: Airbnb protecting hosts not guests
text: Company now over protects hosts. Will easily allow serial bad hosters to remove reviews. Too many bad host experiences and not a good mechanism to account for it.

title: No one to contact when you need help
text: Planned a trip out for weeks, went to go book an airbnb and they restricted my account for an unauthorized party when I had under the limit of guests attending. They then sent me to a support team who could not help, then I got an automated email saying they were upholding their decision meaning I could not book. Completely ruined my plans because of their dumb system.

title: Robbery
text:
How is this possible ?? I was hosting and due to hurricane damage in FL , I had to cancel a $4,000.
Reservation . After place repaired and started hosting again- they took $900. from my first reservation. Unbelievable‚Ä¶ I do not recommend

title: Limited Funtionality
text: Still cannot get a custom promotion to save in the app

title: Annoying Human Verification
text: Annoying human verification feature, designed by someone with too much free time on their hands

title: This app has really gone downhill
text: I‚Äôve been using airbnb for quite some time now. I used to have great experiences with it but in the past year or two I have had some really bad hosts. Dirty sheets and blankets, other cleaning issues, inconvenient and unclear check-in instructions, hosts trying to charge extra fees off platform. The customer support team has generally been helpful but the company needs to do a better job weeding out bad hosts. In the future I‚Äôll be doing most of my bookings with hotels or VRBO

title: Host customer service
text: Customer service for hosts is terrible. I had a guest wreck my home and burned my couches and tables with her cigarettes even after I have a no smoking policy. She also left drugs lying around and caused extensive damage from water leakage due to the fact she left the windows open during a storm when she left. It‚Äôs been days since my reimbursement request and the guys declined it. Airbnb has not been any help I‚Äôve been bounced around to multiple people and they keep telling me all these different things. I‚Äôm supposed to be protected worh air cover but it doesn‚Äôt seem they want to help at all. This is awful!

title: Webpage complicated
text: I do not have internet/wifi reception at my geographic location but I do have cellular capabilities, however, finding a phone number to call or text is next to impossible on your site - if it‚Äôs there, it‚Äôs buried deep!  Frustrating to pay for lack of communication support!

title: Cannot Updat
text: I cannot update the app because of the iOS version it demands. Not everyone has a current phone nor can everyone afford one. How do I check in and communicate with my host? You should have an older version available.

title: Bad experience
text: We booked an Airbnb and we couldn‚Äôt even stay there because we needed a 25yr old. This was not known to us, and we drove 23 hours to Florida thinking we had a place to stay and when we arrived we were informed we had to leave. We tried to get another Airbnb, but we were labeled as ‚Äúscammers‚Äù to any other house we tried to book. We were stranded in FL and Airbnb was not accommodating at all. After long conversations with representatives we came to no solution. It was not accommodating to us after their mistake. It put us all through a tremendous amount of unneeded stress.

title: Customer service not available‚Ä¶
text: My wife, our two young daughters and I visited Hawaii for the first time. We rented an Airbnb at the Monarch Hotel which we had though was going to be good. When we arrive it was hot and turned the air conditioner on which was small and set in the far bottom corner of the room. I checked the view on the very small and uncomfortable balcony. I look over and see that a pigeon had nested there as the was an excessive amount of feces all over the air conditioning unit. We also noticed the bed sheets had stains on them and the small plastic dining tablr was broken, as well as scuffs all over the baseboard of the wall. When I contacted Airbnb the opened a complaint and within a day the complaint was closed. No response just stating they won‚Äôt continue with my complaint. Then I opened another complaint to speak to a manager and that complaint was closed. Not even a moment to talk. As a nurse I understand the severity of potential diseases that inhaled but feces can cause and the health of their customers seemed trivial to Airbnb especially my children‚Äôs health. I will never use Airbnb again. The DO NOT care about you.

title: Consistent quality
text:
I love AirBNb, but my biggest complaint is consistency in quality. As someone who prefers higher end travel, I can‚Äôt get behind Airbnb as a solid option. 
Issue number one is the quality of the bed, it‚Äôs not controlled and I have slept on a mattress that felt over 10 years old on multiple occasions. And I mean a bed that saags to the point you and your significant other roll into one another. Marked as a plus location. 
The next issue, is the bath products. Never have I ever (lol) been at an airbnb with bath products that reflect the quality of the property. If you‚Äôre a plus location, tres seme and herbal essence are not on par. Even holiday inn has better products than this, just say you have nothing would be better.

title: Stuck without a place to stay abroad
text:
Always have loved air bnb. Obviously a platform for third party use but the fist issue I encountered has left me stuck in London(I‚Äôm from Kansas) with no ability to book a new place and the support team is beyond rude and unhelpful. Cost me hours of my trip and significant cost due to the back and forth. Now sitting at a pub hoping they fix it. Frankly if nothing else hope this post convinces you to use Virgo. 

Btw funds are locked up and not only am I now ‚Äúrestricted‚Äù from booking again but embarrassed to say short on funds.

Please never use this app when abroad.

title: Messages Blank
text: When I click on a message, the app only displays a blank screen. I‚Äôve tried closing the app, restarting my phone, etc. This is going to make it very hard (impossible) to communicate with hosts during my trip. Please fix!

title: Don‚Äôt Book With Airbnb
text: They seem to like to pick and choose who they want to ban with no logical explanation other than ‚ÄúYou seem to be associated with someone who isn‚Äôt allowed to use Airbnb‚Äù despite multiple good reviews of character, loyalty to a, what I thought to be a good service. They will just randomly pull a background check on people who have excellent stay reviews and then claim without any sort of reasoning that you can‚Äôt use this app. Whoever runs this company seems to think cannabis is evil and is now disregarding anyone who was part of the war on cannabis. Hope you get rid of all the places who claim to be 420-friendly since you wanna discriminate people who have been tragically affected by that.
